attributes.action: Do everything in his power to allow renal patients the right to treatment, for a better quality of life. To withdraw treatment would mean death!`
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: -:i.e Haemodialysis and or haemodiafiltration no matter whether the person is fit and able, ill or dying. This is the basic need of a dialysis dependant person. Treatment should never be withdrawn unless requested by the patient or family, NOT the decision of the medical staff!!!!
